flavor: "I am the Gardener. And I have many plots that must be reclaimed."
name: The Gardener
text: Forced Response: After the Gardener attacks you, reveal the top card of the GROOT deck.

name: The Gardener
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Reclaim the Green side scheme and reveal it. If it is already in play, resolve its "When Defeated" effect. [star] Forced Response: After the Gardener attacks you, reveal the top card of the GROOT deck.

name: The Gardener
text: [[WOOD]] minions gain toughness. [star] Forced Response: After the Gardener activates against you, reveal the top card of the GROOT deck.

flavor: Knowhere is under attack! Again!
name: Groot Invasion
text: Contents: The Gardener (I) and The Gardener (II). (The Gardener (II) and The Gardener (III) instead for expert mode.) The Gardener, Ship Command II and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Growing Pain). Setup: Set aside each copy of Flora Sapling and shuffle them together into a GROOT deck.

flavor: Flora Colossi are overrunning Knowhere! Get to the Gardener before the Knowhere Corps get overrun!
name: Groot Invasion
text: When Revealed: Each player reveals the top card of the GROOT deck.

flavor: As you deal with the Elder's forces, you swiftly realize - Your crew isn't equipped enough to be on both Knowhere and engage an Elder of the Universe at the same time.
name: Branching Path
text: When Revealed: Advance to stage 2B.

name: Branching Path
text: When Revealed: Each player votes to either defend Knowhere, or confront the Gardener. The first player's vote breaks tie-breakers. Then, if there were more votes to defend Knowhere, advance to Leaf No Survivors 3A. Otherwise, advance to Confront the Root 3A.

flavor: Hopping onto the Milano, you speed towards the Gardener.
name: Confront the Root
text: When Revealed: Each player draws 1 card. (The first player draws 1 additional card.)

flavor: You make a beeline towards the Gardener. Time for an all out offensive.
name: Confront the Root
text: Each character in play gets +1 ATK. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: Hopping onto the Milano, you speed towards Knowhere.
name: Leaf No Survivors
text: When Revealed: Each player reveals the top card of the GROOT deck. Each player who cannot deals themselves a facedown encounter card.

flavor: You dash over to Knowhere to protect as many people as possible.
name: Leaf No Survivors
text: X is equal to the number of enemies in play (including the Gardener). If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "A canine's worst nightmare, da?" -Cosmo
name: Flora Beast
text: Quickstrike. [star] Boost: After this activation, place Flora Beast at the bottom of the GROOT deck.

flavor: "We thought Groot was the last of his kind!" -Gamora
name: Flora Colossus
text: When Defeated: The engaged player reveals the top card of the GROOT deck. [star] Boost: After this activation, place Flora Colossus at the bottom of the GROOT deck.

name: Flora Consumer
text: When Revealed: Defeat the WOOD minion in play with the lowest ATK → the engaged player reveals the top card of the GROOT deck. [star] Boost: After this activation, place Flora Consumer at the bottom of the GROOT deck.

name: Flora Titan
text: Incite 3. Guard. When Revealed: If Flora Titan was revealed from the encounter deck, place Flora Titan at the bottom of the GROOT deck. [star] Boost: After this activation, place Flora Titan at the bottom of the GROOT deck.

flavor: "Thank you Loki... I thought of something." -The Gardener
name: Reclaim the Green
text: When Defeated: Each player reveals the top card of the GROOT deck.

flavor: "OUTTA THE WAY SHRUBBERY!" -Rocket
name: Wode Blockade
text: Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) Hinder 2[per_hero]. When Defeated: Defeat a non-ELITE WOOD minion in play.

flavor: "Now -- Who is hungry?" -The Gardener
name: Groot Swarm
text: When Revealed: Each WOOD minion engaged with your hero attacks you. If no attack was made this way, reveal the top card of the GROOT deck. [star] Boost: This card gains [boost][boost] if you are engaged with a WOOD minion.

flavor: "I'm restoring this world to it's former glory!" -The Gardener
name: Rampant Growth
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top 2 cards of the GROOT deck. If less than 2 cards were revealed this way, this card gains surge.

name: Regrowth
text: Surge. When Revealed: Place the topmost WOOD minion in the encounter discard pile at the bottom of the WOOD deck. [star] Boost: Resolve this card's "When Revealed" effect. (Does not surge.)

flavor: "I am Stab!"
name: Flora Sapling
text: When Defeated: Place Flora Sapling at the bottom of the GROOT deck.

flavor: "You idiots think you can sneak up on me, in a spaceship?!"
name: Warbringer
text: Steady. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Warbringer activates against you, if you control a card with a printed [wild] resource, he gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for this activation.

flavor: "I am the might of the Chitarui army!"
name: Warbringer
text: Steady. Toughness. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Warbringer activates against you, if you control a card with a printed [wild] resource, he gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for this activation.

flavor: "Destroy our enemies! Let none live! Let the world know that WARBRINGER of the Chitauri has come!"
name: Warbringer
text: Steady. Toughness. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Warbringer activates against you, if you control a card with a printed [wild] resource, he gets +2 SCH and +2 ATK for this activation.

flavor: We warped towards the distress signal left by our missing pal, Adam Warlock.
name: Chitauran Command
text: Contents: Warbringer (I) and Warbringer (II). (Warbringer (II) and Warbringer (III) instead for expert mode.) Warbringer, Ship Command II and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Mercenary Fleet). Setup: Set aside the Heavy Cannon and Hyper Thrusters upgrades.

flavor: We've warped right into a Chitauran fleet led by Warbringer, and boy, is he PISSED!
name: Chitauran Command
text: When Revealed: Reveal the Blockade side scheme and exhaust the Milano. In expert mode, deal each player a facedown encounter card and deal 1 damage to the Milano.

flavor: The Chitauran forces encroach closer. We need to buy some time for the Milano to rev up.
name: Stall for Time
text: When Revealed: Advance to stage 2B.

flavor: Buy some time for the ship to rev its engines!
name: Stall for Time
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 time counter here. If there at least 2 time counters here, advance to stage 3A.

flavor: The Milano is revved up! Lets take the fight right to Warbringer!
name: Raring to Go
text: When Revealed: If the previous stage was progressed by time counters, each player votes either Thrusters or Weapons. The first player's vote breaks tie-breakers. If thrusters won, put the set aside Hyper Thrusters into play under the first player's control. Otherwise, put the set aside Heavy Cannon into play under the first player's control.

flavor: "I gave them a chance to yield. Now I will give them the chance to die." -Warbringer
name: Raring to Go
text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "Not this again." -Star-Lord
name: Blockade
text: Assault. [star] Boost: In expert mode, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this activation.

name: Ship Turrets
text: Assault. Hinder 2[per_hero]. Forced Response: After a player ends their turn, that player takes 2 indirect damage. [star] Boost: If damage from this attack defeats an ally, the first player takes 2 indirect damage.

name: Warlord Endurance
text: Warbringer gains stalwart. [star] Boost: This enemy gains stalwart for this activation.

name: Urgent Repairs
text: Hinder 2[per_hero]. Victory 1. When Defeated: Heal 2 damage from the Milano.

name: Weapon of War
text: Attach to Warbringer. [star] Warbringer's attacks gain overkill and piercing. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, it gains overkill and piercing.

name: Warpath
text: Attach to Warbringer. Uses (1 fury counter, plus 1[per_hero] additional fury counters.) [star] Forced Response: After Warbringer activates, remove 1 fury counter from here. (Remove 1 additional fury counter if this activation was an attack that dealt no damage.)

name: Homing Missile
text: Attach to the Milano. Forced Interrupt: At the end of the villain phase, place 1 damage here. If there is 2 or more damage here, move all damage here to attached character or its controller's identity card and discard this card. Response: After attached character defends against an attack, attach this card to the attacker.

name: Chitauri Speeder
text: Quickstrike. Chitauri Speeder engages the first player. [star] Forced Response: After Chitauri Speeder attacks and damages you, spend 1 resource of any type or deal 1 damage to the Milano.

name: Rip Open
text: When Revealed: Place 4 threat on the main scheme. You may exhaust characters you control to prevent threat equal to the total ATK of those characters. Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character you control.

name: Spoils of War
text: When Revealed: Choose to deal 2 indirect damage to the first player or give the villain 1 facedown boost card. [star] Boost: If damage from this attack defeats an ally, the first player takes 2 indirect damage.

name: Warbringer's Wrath
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The first player deals themself a facedown encounter card. When Revealed (Hero): Warbringer attacks you.

name: Heavy Cannon
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Heavy Cannon → deal 1 damage to each enemy. If you control the Milano, deal 1 additional damage to the villain.

name: Hyper Thrusters
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Hyper Thrusters → remove 1 threat from each scheme. If you control the Milano, remove 1 additional threat from the main scheme.

flavor: "I believe! You cannot deny the Truth!"
name: Raker
text: Retaliate 1. Forced Interrupt: When Raker would be defeated, reset his hit points to 8. Then, remove 6 threat from the main scheme (ignoring any ([crisis]) icons).

flavor: "The Truth is light! The Truth is life! The Truth is all things!"
name: Raker
text: Retaliate 1. Steady. Forced Interrupt: When Raker would be defeated, reset his hit points to 12. Then, remove 6 threat from the main scheme (ignoring any ([crisis]) icons).

flavor: We've been captured by the Church of Truth. Luckily, we have a remote controlled Milano.
name: "Here's the Milano!"
text: Contents: Raker (A). (Raker (B) instead for expert mode.) Escape the Church, Ship Command II and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Fetters of Faith). Setup: Each player sets aside each ally, ARMOR, ITEM, LOCATION, PERSONA, TECH, VEHICLE and WEAPON in their deck into a CAPTURED deck. Reveal Church Homeworld.

flavor: Use the Milano to bust a way out of here!
name: "Here's the Milano!"
text: Assault. Forced Interrupt: When the last threat is removed from this scheme, each player searches their CAPTURED deck for 1 card and adds it to their hand. Then, advance to stage 2A. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: The Church has taken some of our friends and stuff. Let's fix that.
name: Spring our Allies
text: When Revealed: Each player places the top 6 cards of their CAPTURED deck under here.

name: Spring our Allies
text: Forced Interrupt: When the last threat is removed from this scheme, the players as a group return 2[per_hero] facedown cards here into their owner's hands. The players advance to stage 3A if there are no cards here. If they do not advance, place 4[per_hero] threat here. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: We've grabbed what and who we can! Its time for the last part of our master plan...
name: The Grand Escape
text: When Revealed: Deal each player a facedown encounter card.

flavor: "Scatter? That's your plan? Scatter?" -Jack Flag
name: The Grand Escape
text: If there is no threat here, the players win the game. If this stage is completed or the Milano is defeated, the players lose the game.

name: Church Homeworld
text: Permanent. Setup. Forced Interrupt: When a card makes a player place any number of cards from their CAPTURED deck under a card, for each card a player couldn't place this way, they place 1 card from the top of their deck instead.

flavor: "I believe! Your bullets cannot harm me!"
name: Guard of Truth
text: Guard. Patrol. When Revealed: Place the top card of a CAPTURED deck facedown here. When Defeated: Return each facedown card here to it's owner's hand.

name: Church Patrol
text: Assault. Hinder 3[per_hero]. When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their CAPTURED deck facedown here. When Defeated: Return each card here to it's owner's hand.

name: Interrogation Room
text: Assault. Hinder 3[per_hero]. When Revealed: Each player searches their CAPTURED deck for an ally or a PERSONA card and places it facedown here. When Defeated: Return each card here to it's owner's hand.

name: Raid the Armory
text: Assault. Hinder 3[per_hero]. When Revealed: Each player searches their CAPTURED deck for an upgrade and places it facedown here. When Defeated: Return each card here to it's owner's hand.

flavor: "We're outnumbered a flarkjillion to one!" -Star-Lord
name: Evade Notice
text: Incite 1. When Revealed: Either spend 2 resources of any type or be confused. [star] Boost: You are confused.

flavor: "Bow down heathen! The Church demands your submission!" -Raker
name: Hunt the Heretics
text: When Revealed: For each character you control, discard the top 8 cards of your deck or exhaust that character.

name: Zealous Strike
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Raker attacks you with +1 ATK. If no damage was dealt this way, add the top card of a CAPTURED deck to it's owner's hand.

flavor: "Adam, Adam, what a marvel you are..."
name: High Evolutionary
text:
Cards with 1 or fewer printed icons ([star] and [boost]) in the card's boost area gain [boost] for each progress counter on the main scheme.
Minions get +1 hit point for each icons ([star] and [boost]) in their boost area.

flavor: "Apes you were, apes you shall be again."
name: High Evolutionary
text:
Cards with 1 or fewer printed icons ([star] and [boost]) in the card's boost area gain [boost] for each progress counter on the main scheme.
Minions get +1 hit point for each icons ([star] and [boost]) in their boost area.

flavor: "You think this over? That you've won?"
name: High Evolutionary
text:
Cards with 1 or fewer printed icons ([star] and [boost]) in the card's boost area gain [boost] for each progress counter on the main scheme.
Minions get +1 hit point for each icons ([star] and [boost]) in their boost area.

flavor: Adam Warlock is being used as 'material' by the High Evolutionary to make his army...
name: Obtain Perfection
text: Contents: High Evolutionary (I) and High Evolutionary (II). (High Evolutionary (II) and High Evolutionary (III) instead for expert mode.) High Evolutionary and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Order in Entropy). Setup: Place 1 progress counter here.

name: Obtain Perfection
text: X is 6 plus the number of progress counters here. Forced Interrupt: When this scheme would be completed, place 1 progress here. Then, remove all threat from this scheme. The players lose the game when there are 3 progress counters here.

flavor: "Desist." -High Evolutionary
name: Backlash
text: Attach to High Evolutionary. Forced Interrupt: When High Evolutionary would be stunned or confused, discard Backlash → the active player gains that status card instead. [star] Boost: Give this enemy a tough status card.

name: Evolution Suit
text: Attach to the minion with the fewest icons in its boost area. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Attached minion is [[EVOLUTIONARY]] trait, gets [boost][boost][boost] and gains retaliate 1. When Revealed: Give attached minion a tough status card. [star] Boost: Attach this card to a minion.

name: Evolved Weapon
text: Attach to the minion with the fewest icons in its boost area. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Attached minion is [[EVOLUTIONARY]] trait and gets [boost]. When Revealed: Attached minion activates against you. [star] Boost: Attach this card to a minion.

name: Induced Evolution
text: Attach to the minion with the fewest icons in its boost area. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Attached minion gains [[EVOLUTIONARY]] trait and gets [boost]. When Revealed: Attached minion activates against you. [star] Boost: Attach this card to a minion.

name: Evolutionary
text: Guard. Villainous. When Revealed: This minion gets [boost][boost][boost]. [star] Boost: Put Evolutionary into play engaged with you. It cannot activate this step.

name: Evolutionarian
text: Guard. Villainous. When Revealed: Deal the topmost TECH attachment in the encounter discard pile to yourself as a facedown encounter card. [star] Boost: Resolve this card's "When Revealed" ability.

name: Legions of Evolutionaries
text: Assault. Hinder 2[per_hero]. When Defeated: Shuffle each EVOLUTIONARY minion in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

flavor: "I want you to worship me."
name: The Magus
text: Steady. [star] The Magus's attacks deal indirect damage. Forced Response: After the encounter deck resets, give The Magus a facedown boost card.

flavor: "I say that like you've got a choice."
name: The Magus
text: Steady. Toughness. [star] The Magus's attacks deal indirect damage. Forced Response: After the encounter deck resets, give The Magus a facedown boost card.

name: The Magus
text: Steady. Toughness. [star] The Magus's attacks deal indirect damage. Forced Response: After the encounter deck resets, give The Magus a facedown boost card and deal the first player 1 facedown encounter card.

name: Temple of The Magus
text: Contents: The Magus (I) and The Magus (II). (The Magus (II) and The Magus (III) instead for expert mode.) The Magus, Ship Command II and Standard encounter sets. Four modular encounter sets (recommended: Cosmic Sorcery, Fetters of Faith, New Men and Powers Cosmic). Setup: Find Cathedral and reveal it. Discard the top 2[per_hero] cards of the encounter deck.

name: Temple of The Magus
text: Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player discards 2 cards from the encounter deck. Each player places 1 threat here if the cards they discarded were from different encounter sets. Forced Response: After The Magus is defeated, advance to stage 2B. Threat on this stage carries over. When this scheme is completed, players lose game.

flavor: "You've toppled the believers that give The Magus his powers. However, his plans are almost complete to topple the cosmic scales to Life forevermore."
name: Usurp Death
text: When Revealed: Each player discards 4 cards from the encounter deck. Each player deals themself a facedown encounter card if the cards they discarded were from different encounter sets.

flavor: "Could you all be any more tragically heroic?" -The Magus
name: Usurp Death
text: Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player discards 2 cards from the encounter deck. Each player places 1 threat here if the cards they discarded were from different encounter sets. When this scheme is completed, players lose game.

flavor: "First, bullets, then wood. For cosmic super heroes, you're not very high tech." -The Magus
name: Cosmic Ward
text: Attach to The Magus. The Magus gains retaliate 1. Forced Interrupt: When a player plays an event, cancel its effects → discard Cosmic Ward. [star] Boost: Attach Cosmic Ward to The Magus.

flavor: "Trillions of true believers, all converted in preparation for this one act. All chanting the same incantation!" -The Magus
name: Quantum Magic
text: Attach to The Magus. The Magus gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK. [star] Forced Response: After The Magus activates, deal the topmost The Magus card in the encounter discard pile to yourself as a facedown encounter card → discard Quantum Magic.

flavor: "Wow. That thing's really glowing. That the flagship?" -Captain Marvel
name: Cathedral
text: Assault. [star] Boost: In expert mode, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this activation.

flavor: "You know there are just some things you can't stop." -The Magus
name: Mystic Senses
text: Encounter cards that do not belong to The Magus encounter set gain incite 1. [star] Boost: You are confused. If you are already confused, discard 1 card from your hand.

flavor: "There's always a price to pay." -The Magus
name: Cosmic Awareness
text: Surge. When Revealed: Discard 4 cards from the encounter deck. If you are in alter-ego form and if each card discarded this way were from different sets, The Magus schemes.

flavor: "We haven't met. I am Adam Magus." -The Magus
name: Karmic Blast
text: Surge. When Revealed: Discard 4 cards from the encounter deck. If you are in hero form and if each card discarded this way were from different sets, The Magus attacks you.

name: Milano
text: Setup. The first player controls Milano. It does not count against your ally limit. Milano cannot be affected by player cards. It can only attack VEHICLE enemies. If Milano leaves play, the players lose the game.

flavor: "Flark me." -Rocket Racoon
name: Hazardous Terrain
text: Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) Hinder 2[per_hero].

name: Rogue Ship
text: Rogue Ship engages the first player. Forced Interrupt: When Rogue Ship would take 3 or less non-piercing damage, it takes 0 damage instead. [star] Boost: Choose: Either exhaust the Milano, or this card gains [boost][boost].

flavor: "Any chance you could give me back the tech you stole from me?" -Rocket
name: All Hands on Deck
text: Give to the first player. When Revealed: Spend 2 resources of any type. For each [mental] resource spent this way, heal 1 damage from the Milano.

name: Evasive Maneuver
text: Give to the first player. When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain schemes. If no threat was placed this way, give the Milano a tough status card. When Revealed (Hero): The villain attacks you. If no damage was dealt this way, give the Milano a tough status card.

flavor: "Weird thing! Don't want to hit the weird thing!" -Star-Lord
name: Outrun Danger
text: Give to the first player. When Revealed: Take 3 indirect damage. If the Milano took no damage this way, give the Milano a tough status card.

name: Growing Pain
flavor: Break the tree and you sunder the ground.
text: Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) Hinder 2[per_hero]. When Defeated: Discard 5 cards from the encounter deck.

flavor: "I- am- hungry!"
name: Flora Giant
text: Toughness. When Defeated: Discard 3 cards from the encounter deck. [star] Boost: Resolve this card's "When Defeated" ability.

name: Entangling Vines
text: When Revealed: Discard 4 cards from the encounter deck. You are stunned. If you are already stunned, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: You are stunned. If you are already stunned, discard 4 cards from the encounter deck.

name: Ship Siege
text: Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) Hinder 2[per_hero]. When Defeated: Deal 4 damage to a VEHICLE minion.

name: Assault Ship
text: [star] Assault Ship's attacks deal indirect damage. Forced Interrupt: When Assault Ship would take 3 or less non-piercing damage, it takes 0 damage instead. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, it deals indirect damage.

name: Chitauri Leviathan
text: Forced Interrupt: When Chitauri Leviathan would take 3 or less non-piercing damage, it takes 0 damage instead.

name: Warp Ship
text: When Revealed: Warp Ship activates against you. Forced Interrupt: When Warp Ship would take 3 or less non-piercing damage, it takes 0 damage instead. [star] Boost: Put Warp Ship into play engaged with you.

flavor: "We have our new God... And he is ready to be born."
name: The Matriarch
text:
The Matriarch cannot take damage while Universal Church of Truth is in play.
The Universal Church of Truth gains an [amplify] icon.

name: Universal Church of Truth
text: Forced Response: After a player resets their deck, exhaust that player's identity card and stun it. [star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Acolyte of Truth
text: Guard. When Revealed: If Universal Church of Truth is in play, this card gains surge. Otherwise, find Universal Church of Truth and reveal it. [star] Boost: Put Acolyte of Truth into play engaged with you.

flavor: "I believe!"
name: Cardinal of Truth
text: Cardinal of Truth cannot take damage while the Universal Church of Truth is in play. [star] Forced Response: After Cardinal of Truth activates, place 2 threat on Universal Church of Truth.

flavor: "Again, the Acolytes of the Church. Why are their thoughts so piercing? So insistent?" -Moondragon
name: Spread the Word
text: Surge. When Revealed: Each player engaged with a minion discards the top 5 cards of their deck.

name: Luminous
text: Forced Response: After Luminous activates against you, discard 1 card from the encounter deck. If 3 or more icons ([star] and [boost]) in the card's boost area were discarded this way, deal yourself 1 encounter card.

name: Order in Entropy
text: Permanent. Setup. Forced Response: After cards are discarded from the encounter deck or the surge keyword is resolved, place 1 threat here. Then, if there is 10 or more threat here, find Luminous and put her into play engaged with the first player. Then, remove all but 5 threat.

name: Bend Chaos
text: When Revealed: Find Luminous and reveal her. (If she is already in play, she engages you.) Luminous activates against you. If no enemy activated this way, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: Discard 5 cards from the encounter deck.

name: Hex Bolt
text: When Revealed: Discard 3 cards from the encounter deck. For each card discarded this way with icons ([star] and [boost]) in the card's boost area equal to: • 0, discard 1 card from your hand. • 1, place 1 threat on the main scheme. • 2, take 1 indirect damage. • 3+, this card gains surge.

name: Master of the Dark Arts
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until you discard a SPELL → deal it to yourself as a facedown encounter card. [star] Boost: Resolve this card's "When Revealed" ability.

flavor: "Just creating a little elbow room." -The Magus
name: Magic Attack
text: When Revealed: The players as a group either spends [physical][physical][physical] resources or each hero and ally takes 2 damage. [star] Boost: Your hero and each ally you control takes 1 damage.

flavor: "You couldn't kill me if you tried." -The Magus
name: Shield Spell
text: When Revealed: The players as a group either spends [energy][energy][energy] resources or each player is stunned and takes 1 damage. [star] Boost: You are stunned.

flavor: "Rich! Look! There are whole planets appearing!" -Quasar
name: Summoning Spell
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until you discard a minion → reveal that minion. [star] Boost: Give this enemy 2 more boost cards.

flavor: "Mantis! Cosmo! What's the *tik* matter with you?" -Bug
name: Zone of Silence
text: When Revealed: The players as a group either spends [mental][mental][mental] resources or each player is confused and discards 1 card from their hand. [star] Boost: You are confused.

name: Lord Gator
text: Toughness. Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.) [star] Boost: Give this enemy 1 more boost card. If this activation deals damage to you, deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card.

name: Dhrovo
text: Quickstrike. Forced Response: After Dhrovo attacks and deals damage to you, exhaust your hero. [star] Boost: Give this enemy 1 more boost card. If this activation deals damage to you, exhaust your hero.

name: Evolved Tracker
text: Forced Response: After Evolved Tracker activates against you, discard 1 card from your hand. [star] Boost: Give this enemy 1 more boost card. If this activation deals damage to you, discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Ja'Rou
text: Surge. [star] Ja'Rou's attacks gain piercing. [star] Boost: Give this enemy 1 more boost card. If this activation deals damage to you, put Ja'Rou into play engaged with you.

name: New Men Soldier
text: Guard. When Defeated: Give the villain 1 facedown boost card. [star] Boost: Give this enemy 1 boost card. If this activation dealt damage to you, give this enemy 1 facedown boost card.

name: Harness the Cosmos
text: When Defeated: Discard cards from the encounter deck until you discard a card which has 3 or more printed icons ([star] and [boost]) in the card's boost area. Deal that card to yourself as a facedown encounter card.

name: Cosmic Prowess
text: Attach to the villain. Attached character gains steady. (In expert mode, they gain stalwart instead.) Hero Action: Stun your hero and spend [physical][physical][physical] resources → discard Cosmic Prowess.
errata: MCDB: discard Cosmic Prowess instead discard Cosmic Mastery

flavor: "I helped make this universe... I will NOT be manhandled!" -The Gardener
name: Cosmic Might
text: When Revealed: Give the villain 1 facedown boost card. (In expert mode, give the villain 1 additional facedown boost card.) [star] Boost: Give the villain 2 facedown boost cards.

name: Cosmic Regeneration
text: Surge. When Revealed: Remove each status card from the villain. Give the villain a tough status card. [star] Boost: This enemy gains stalwart for this activation.

name: Delusion of Collusion
text: Attach to your identity. You cannot ready allies or [[persona]] supports you control. Alter-Ego Action: Discard an ally or [[persona]] support you control → discard this card. [star] Boost: If any ally is defeated by this attack, take indirect damage equal to that ally's printed cost.

name: Manipulated Mind
text: Treat attached ally as a minion with a blank text box (except for [[traits]]). Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When Revealed: Attach to the ally you control with the lowest cost. Attached ally engages its controller. Otherwise, this card gains surge.

flavor: "Thanos? Father? No! Not now!" -Gamora
name: Old Grudge
text: Attached minion gets +1 hit point. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for your nemesis minion, then reveal that minion. Attach Old Grudge to it. (Shuffle.) [star] Boost: Deal 1 damage to each character you control.

name: Analysis Paralysis
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for your nemesis side scheme, then reveal it. Place X additional threat here, where X is equal to the amount of threat on that side scheme.
